Wouldn't accept any of the serial #s as of 7/17, didn't matter whether or not the hosts file was modified, the results were the same for me every time.  I assume they invalidated all the serials in the readme file.
works great..lifetime subscription active. just use the crack.paste it in the installed folder and replace the one it was there from before.i think,its a simple explanation :) any kid can follow.
Can we update it or should I leave update alone?

hmm kind of odd.  Basically heres what I did.  I installed this then it ran on it's own.  i wasn't sure what to do but updated it just for shit's and giggles.  Then I saw bottom right a link to activate so I restarted.  Then I put the crack exe in the install folder and restarted superantispyware.  It would appear everything is fine now.  The activation thing in the bottom right is gone...only thing is I guess I didn't even have to use a serial and the Uploader says you have to so....I dunno lol.  I just had to enter the 9 digit number on the original install.
the crack does not work anymore and any of the serial provided with registration . so you can use the free version, but no the pro one
